name: Quiz 1
questions: Chefs in this game are used as a metaphor for which task scheduling concept
What is the term in task scheduling for the total duration of all tasks across the machines?
Get out a pen and paper. If I have 2 machines and 5 tasks of durations 8, 6, 5, 5, and 5 minutes, what is the optimal makespan?

dialogue.text: Let's see how well you remember the task scheduling terms we talked about!
dialogue.name: Mr. Steel

name: Quiz 2
questions: What is the term for when every machine completes tasks at the SAME rate?

dialogue.text: Time to test you on some new terms. Good luck!
dialogue.name: Mr. Steel
